price: da bi poricali ono što im Mi dajemo, i da bi uživali. A znat će oni!
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum waliyatamattaʿū fasawfa yaʿlamūna
